item.description:
I discovered today that Manhattan on the Pearl is closed and is being replaced bya place called Stella Blu. I'm guessing its a Martini Bar, but not sure so anyway, we are going to Black Orchid Grille instead. The restaurant has promised us a private room for our dining pleasure.

About the Restautant of the Month:
It is our pleasure to serve you, whether you are looking to enjoy a nice meal out, or meeting with some friends at our martini bar. Our New American cuisine puts a fresh twist on some old American classics. Like our Parmesan Encrusted Haddock & Scallops, rubbed with sour cream, topped with parmesan cheese and baked to a perfect caramelized finish.

If you are looking for a relaxing night out with friends, our Martini & Wine Bar has something for every taste. We carry a full range of Martini's, Wines, Apertifs, Liquor, Malts, and Imported and Domestic Beer.

http://www.blackorchi...

Menu:

http://www.blackorchi...

Directions

item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.
item.name: Dinner at Black Orchid Grille
